page.title: 07Blandford - School Sports
page.content: Yesterday was Wednesday an exciting day in Blandford because at Archbishop Wake First School it was Sports Day. My friend & I saw a man put up the flags for the start & finish. We race lots of children & most of the little ones either fall over or lose plim- soles all over the track.I ran in bare feet and I came first.I got a ticket.I had never ever won.I was surprised and puffed out.There were a lot of parents cheering us on.In the monkey race you run on your hands & feet.My best bit was when the'bang'of the gun didn't go off & Mrs Darke had to use the whistle instead! At last it was time for our inter-class relay.We started with 3 Eastenders & 4 Westenders & finished up all the opposite places.Shanena's Mum fell over in the Mums race.There were hot & tired people everywhere but it was very exciting.{Class 5L.
